title: Post Match Screen Flash
body: Every time I complete a match and it sends me to the post match stats screen the area around my client, where my desktop background is visible, flashes black. Is it a problem with my client, my graphics driver, my resolution, or something else?

replies.body:
This could definitely be an issue with your graphics driver or your power settings. I recommend working through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), which consolidates steps that address these issues.

Let me know if this issue persists through those steps.
